document_data.name: ''Staff of Halt Undead''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Staff of halt undead''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[staff]] favored by both enemies and puppeteers of the [[undead]].
document_data.Description: These staves appeared to be unassuming cracked and withered walking sticks.
document_data.Powers: These staves allowed the wielder to cast a potent version of the ''[[halt undead]]'' spell. On average, these staves possessed three charges.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], one of the ''staves of halt undead'' was in possession of a [[wizard]] of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] found on the top level of the [[Elven Catacombs]] underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]].
